1.content:
“Bored, bored, bored…” Is all Jeff said as he strolls through the mall. Everyday he did the same old same old. Same old school, same old family, same old outings, same old routine. All of it dull and tiresome. He couldn’t take this anymore. He wishes there was some way in getting some excitement in his life. Her mother decided to take him to the mall to buy some video game or a DVD. She also gave him some money to pay for them, like $50 to $60 dollars. Though he likes her mom taking him to the mall to get something for himself, it just that none of the games and movies would keep him entertained enough. He just wants something that can keep him excited everyday.

The first place he went is a Game Stop just to pick a game of his choosing. He went to the New Release Section to see what they have. “Let’s see…” he said to himself, “Dead Space 2, Halo Reach, Epic Mickey, World of Warcraft…” Looking through the racks, he shook his head in defeat. Sure they are good games, but they won’t keep him busy for a few weeks tops. “There’s got to be something interesting I can play for hours on end.” he said as he browse through the store.

As he was looking through the shelves he noticed something that caught his eyes. There was a PC box he had never seen before. He picked it up, he looked at the title that says, ‘Chronivac 4.0’ and it shows a picture of a guy with arrows pointing to a baby, animal, anthro, a smaller version of him, a woman, and a lamp. Curious about this, he turned the box over to look at the description. It says…

‘Tired of the everyday life? Need to spice things up a bit? Well today is your lucky day. Introducing the new Chronivac 4.0. This game is designed to transform you or anyone around you into anything you dream of. Choose from thousands of packages including, turning into a baby, aging to an old person, turning into an animal, changing your gender, go inanimate, shrink or grow, anything you want. What makes this game special then it’s predecessors is that you can change reality and the minds of the people around you, that way they won’t suspect you’ve changed. It’s hours upon hours of fun and is quite enjoyable for people of all ages. Don’t get bored of your life. Change it entirely!’

After reading through the description, Jeff thought this through and wondered about a game like this. “Hmm… A game where you can change the world around you huh?” he asked himself in pure curiousness, “Never heard of something like that before. Maybe it’s something that just came out today. … Oh well, I might try this out. If what this box said is true, then maybe I can have all the fun that I want.”

Satisfied, he headed to the cashier and paid for his new game. He was quite surprised that the cost of the game is cheap. For a game he never heard before, it would’ve been expensive. Brushing that aside, he left the store and joined up with his mother. The two then left the mall and headed back home by car. Once they arrived home, Jeff ran up the stairs and headed to his room, locking the door behind him. He knows that his brother is back from college due to an unexpected snowstorm that closed the school down. He knows damn well how much Drake bullies him the moment he’s home. He then headed to the computer and installed the game in his hard drive. After going through with the installation and setting the whole thing up, he took a deep breath and clicked on the icon that shows a man turning into a variety of things gif. Within seconds the game opened up with the title that says ‘Chronivac 4.0’ that shows the same picture of the transforming man. The moment he clicked on the ‘Start’ icon, a message instantly popped out saying…

‘Hello and welcome to the Chronivac 4.0. Before you begin your adventure, you need to get a better understanding with the program. The steps of this game are simple…

Step 1: Choose your transformation package (Age, Animal, Anthro, Size, Body Modification, Gender, Inanimate, etc.),
Step 2: Type the name the person, animal, or inanimate object you want to change. An info tab will be placed under the search to make sure your choice is correct.
Step 3: Type down all the information for the transformation. Start with what to transform the target into, then the time duration between one second (incredibly fast) or a year (which is gradually slow). After that, you have to put a yes or no survey on a few choices including clothing change, mental change, reality change, and permanent change.
Step 4: If you want to add something for your change, be sure to type it in the ‘Add Information’ box.
Step 5: Once you finished with your choices, click on the ‘Start Transformation’ icon at the bottom.
Step 6: Enjoy the change.

Remember if you choose to make this change a permanent one, you will never return to your normal form. If you keep the change permanent and not have a mental change and changing your reality, that will be fine. Just choose your choices wisely. But remember to have fun with it. Enjoy!’

Jeff read through the instructions and could tell this looks a little complicated then expected. He doesn’t want to have his changes permanent and would end up like something else for the rest of his life. So he decided to skip that unless it’s necessary. Clicking on the OK button, he entered the main menu where it is full of transformation packages. Looking through his options, he rubbed his chin and wondered where to begin. “Now let’s see…” he said to himself, “What should I pick first?”
1.title: The Beginning

11.content:
Looking through each package, Jeff decided to pick the first option, the Age Package. Once he clicked on the option, a new page opened up followed by a pop up window saying…

‘Welcome to the Age Package! This is where you can age or regress you or anyone around you into the desired age. Just type the name of the person and entered the age you want him or her to be. A word of caution: you have to select the age range between –9 months (the moment you were conceived) to 100-years-old (the eldest year to date). If you go past a hundred, you would instantly die and will never be revived ever again. But if you go past –9 months, you will not die, only unconceived. Meaning your sperm and egg cell will be separated and you have to wait until your mother and father reconceive you. Be careful if you go past the two marks, for you will never reverse it once the aging or regressing begins.’

Reading through the directions, Jeff nodded and understood what not to do. The last thing he wants is to die of old age or regress to the point of being an egg cell. Scrolling down to the choices he looked at the search box and wondered who would he change first.

131.title: His Mother

1311.content:
Jeff woke up to the smell of waffles. He looked at his alarm clock, only 7'o'clock. He put on a set of clean clothes and went downstairs. The kitchen was, of course, the source of the delicious smell. Emily was hopping around with a plate of freshly baked waffles.

"Good morning sunshine. Waffle?" She said, holding one up with a fork.

Jeff yawned grabbing a seat at the kitchen table. "Looks good. Yes please." He said appreciatively. Emily wasn't usually this spry before 8 o clock. He wondered if this was due to the Chronivac. She did seem shorter...

"Mom, how high are you?" He asked before taking a bite.

"That's an odd question. This isn't the munchies, young man. I'm just making breakfast." She said quizzically.

"No, I mean your height. How much is your height?" He smiled at the miscommunication. Slips like that were at least common with Emily, especially since he had openly admitted to using pot occasionally. Mom and dad had reacted bemused, saying they must have had a boatload of smoke-able sedatives in their day. They told him they figured not everybody who used was an addict, and had encouraged him to experiment.

"Oooh, I see. Silly me" She laughed and made a gesture, as if wiping her silliness away. "Well, my passport says I'm 5'3". I don't think that's changed much since I had you, young man."

Well there he had it. He was pretty sure she was only 4 inches smaller than dad, who was 5'10". That meant she'd lost about 3 inches already.

"You don't want honey with those waffles?" She sat down and poured the honey over her own waffle. "I know I'll take plenty over mine. I don't know what it is with this stuff, I just can't seem to get enough of it." She took a bite of a honey-drowned waffle and wiped the spill off her chin. "Oh! Delicious stuff."

13112.content:
After breakfast, Jeff went to school and pretty soon he was back into the everyday drag of things, the chronivac mostly forgotten. He was reminded of it the next day, at breakfast.

He got down , same as yesterday, a little past 7. He poured himself a glass of milk and sat down, just as a basket of laundry walked in on two short but very voluptuous legs.

"Morning!" The laundry basket greeted him with a high pitched, cheerful, female voice.

Emily put down the overflowing laundry basket. Jeff noted she had changed quite a bit from yesterday. Maybe the changes were only brought about when she was sleeping?

She was now down to 4 feet, giving her the average height of a 10 year old. Her midriff had skinned down noticeably, but her other proportions hadn't changed as much making her hips, bust and bosom stand out like skate-padding on a raccoon. She was wearing a stretchy yellow tube-top, black bolero and licorice-colored leather skirt.

She was wearing strikingly taut make-up. Black eye-liner, russian-red lips and he expected some sort of foundation as her skin was smooth as sanded wood.

Jeff couldn't help but stare at what the Chronivac had done. "What's wrong?" Emily asked him with a worried look. He shrugged. "It's nothing, mom. You look stunning, is all." In response to which came an endearing 'aww', a balmy kiss on his cheek and a slightly awkward hug. He drew in her scent, she smelled like a flowery meadow in the summertime. When they broke, all of a dog's age later, he was left with the fuzzy, tranquil feeling of unconditional love.

"My handsome sweet relish. You always know how to brighten my day." Her candy-coated response would normally be enough to make him burst out laughing. But now he could feel something other than humor in her words, something heartfelt and tender.

info.brief_description: Jeff bought a new game in a video game store that changes everyone into anything.
info.description:
Based on an interactive story on CYOC.net. A young teenage boy bored with the everyday life, found a computer program that can change the ordinary to the extraordinary. What sort of chaos will he cause?

Profiles

Name: Jeffrey Dolner
Age: 16
Height: 4 ft. 6 in.
Weight: 125 pounds
Designation: High school student, main character
Hair: Brown, short cut
Eyes: Dark Brown
Bio: Jeffrey, Jeff for short is the main character in this story. Jeff’s is an average with an average life. Almost too average. Everyday for him is the same boring routine. Get up, have breakfast, go to school, stay till three, homework, dinner, bed. He’s sick and tired of doing the same old thing. Not to mention the some of the time he gets bullied by his older brother from college. Sometimes, he gets his chance to play video games, watch TV, or listen to music just to get away from the outside word. But all of that is short lived. But when he gets a computer game that can change everything, it’s going to make his life pretty interesting.

Name: Katharine Dolner
Age: 8
Height: 3 ft. 9 in.
Weight: 105 pounds
Designation: Grade school student, Jeff’s little sister
Hair: Blonde, pigtails
Eyes: Light blue
Bio: Katharine, Katie for short, is Jeff’s little sister. Kind, energetic, fun to play with, she’s always the baby in the family. She loves her mother because she takes good care of her and looks up to Jeff like a role model.

Name: Drake Dolner
Age: 24
Height: 5 ft. 5 in.
Weight: 140 pounds
Designation: College student, Jeff’s older brother
Hair: Dark brown, shaggy
Eyes: Dark blue
Bio: Drake is Jeff’s older brother. A college student and captain of the football team, Drake is always the big guy. And since he’s big, he always bullies his litter brother a lot. Jeff wishes that there were some way in teaching his older brother a lesson in respect. Maybe with the new computer program he obtains he can get the respect he deserves.

Name: Emily Dolner
Age: 42
Height: 5 ft. 4 in.
Weight: 155 pounds
Designation: Jeff’s mother
Hair: Dull red with a few streaks of gray hair
Eyes Dark blue
Bio: Emily is a housewife and mother of three children. She’s very loving and keeps the house neat and tidy. Sometimes she misses her young days hanging out with friends, going to clubs, and such. What happens when the Chronivac comes into play.

Name: Richard Dolner
Age: 44
Height: 5 ft. 7 in.
Weight: 160 pounds
Designation: Jeff’s father, full time worker
Hair: Dark brown with a few strands of gray, balding at the top
Eyes: Dark brown
Bio: Richard is the father of three children. Working full time at a business corporation, he does all he could to keep food on the table. Sometimes the work he does is keeping a toll in his body. He’s tired, he got a beer belly, and there are signs of baldness in the back of his head. He wishes his life was a whole lot easier. Wonder if the Chronivac can do something.

Name: Elizabeth Tenier
Age: 85
Height: 4 ft. 9 in.
Weight: 205 pounds
Designation: Jeff’s Grandmother
Hair: Grey and white perm
Eyes: Dull blue
Bio: Elizabeth is the grandmother of Jeff. She’s just like her daughter, kind and generous. She used to live in a house down in Tampa. But when her husband passed away, she had to move with her daughter’s family cause of all the memories she used to have. Sometimes, she wants to spend more time with her grandchildren, but since she had very little energy, she never gets the chance. Jeff would do anything for her grandmother.

Name: Buster
Breeder: Retriever
Gender: Male
Age: 16 dog years
Designation: Family dog
Fur: Brown
Eyes: Black
Bio: Buster is a dog who is part of the Dolner family. He’s energetic, happy, and always comes to any member of the family just to be with them. But he spends most of the time with Jeff. Everyday Jeff takes Buster out for walks, play catch with him, and gives him special treats if he was good. Buster wishes he could spend more time with Jeff since Jeff goes out most of the time.

Name: Sharon Heshenburg
Age: 16
Height: 3 ft. 8 in.
Weight: 123 pounds
Designation: High school student, Jeff’s girlfriend
Hair: Black, long
Eyes: Green
Bio: Sharon attends the same high school as Jeff and she’s his girlfriend. They met when they were freshmen. Now juniors, their friendship evolved into something much more special. They have been together for two years and spend their time in the movies, the mall, and all other places teenagers hangout at. They also share things together no matter if its something personal or secretive.

Name: Matt Brotmore
Age: 17
Height: 3 ft. 6 in.
Weight: 120 pounds
Designation: High school student, Jeff’s best friend
Hair: Sandy brown, shortcut.
Eyes: Light brown
Bio: Matt met Jeff back in kindergarten and has been friends with him ever since. In fact, he goes to the same high school as Jeff. They usually hang out in the Mall and sometimes Jeff brings his girlfriend with them for teenager stuff. Sometimes Matt goes to Jeff’s house just to hangout.

Rules

1. All known transformations are allowed (AP, AR, Animal, Furry, Body Modification, Size, Transgender, Inanimate, etc.).
2. Nudity is allowed.
3. No deaths (Except for the person to be unconceived).
4. Cursing is allowed.
5. Sex is allowed.
6. Have fun!
